MeetDakuku

As a people-driven leader, DAP is passionate about helping people realize their optimal leadership potential, translating vision to concrete and amazing results. Spent 20 years in public sector serving at all levels and two arms of government in Nigeria with outstanding results that is acknowledged nationally and globally. Over these years he has developed unique understanding of public sector in developing countries and have helped organizations and individuals navigate the terrain and turn...

As featured on

One Man, Many Personalities

Public Sector Reformer and Leadership Advocate

Accomplished Scholar, Author, and Inspirational Speaker

People-Driven Public Figure Driving Infrastructure Development

STORY OF A GOVERNMENT AGENCY

Strategic Turnaround

"Strategic Turnaround is the definitive case study of the radical reform of the Nigerian Maritime Administration and Safety Agency (NIMASA), and of the entire maritime sector in Nigeria. But this story of how strategic change was initiated, instigated and successfully managed has relevance far outside Nigeria. Given Nigeria's size and NIMASA's importance, it is a key case study in successful high-level change management, and also an essential insight into the maritime sector of an emerging maritime power."

Chris Bellamy,
Professor Emeritus of Maritime Security University of Greenwich
